messages.title: Real Representation for North Dorset
messages.content: I will fight for a proper share of investment and respect for rural areas.

messages.title: Securing Our Future
messages.content: I will stand up for the people and the interest of North Dorset.

messages.title: To serve
messages.content: I promise to be up front about my decisions and follow the highest ethical standards.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight for a fully funded NHS true to its founding principles.
I will fight for better broadband for rural communities.
I will fight for a sustainable future for British farming and food.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This time Labour will win here with your vote!

issues.environment: I will fight for our environmental protection.
issues.health: I will fight for a fully funded NHS true to its founding principles.

housing.content: Homes fit for families where children thrive - not the mould.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was born, raised and schooled in North Dorset.

contactInformation.address: Labour South West, 4 Emery Road, Brislington, Bristol, BS4 5PF

quotes.text: A valued colleague, who consistently vouched for the people of North Dorset.

images.caption: Kim Fendley speaking at an event

leaflet.additionalNotes: Please return your postal vote by 4th May.
